thag18.1:9.4: aṅguli cettha → aṅgulī pettha (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed, mr)
thag18.1:10.1: Kuṭṭamūlañca → kuḍḍamūlañca (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed); kuḍḍamūlaṃ vā (pts-vp-pli2ed)
thag18.1:30.3: taṃsadiso → hīnohaṃ sadiso (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
thag18.1:31.4: tañce → taṃ ve (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli2ed); tañ ca (pts-vp-pli1ed)
